# Contributing

1.  Create an issue. First look through [the open issues](https://github.com/samiurprapon/Aether/issues).
1.  Clone the repository or fork it.

         git clone https://github.com/samiurprapon/blog.git

1.  Create your feature branch:

         git checkout -b new-feature

1.  Commit your changes:

         git commit -m 'Add some feature'

1.  Push to the branch:

         git push origin new-feature

1.  Submit a pull request.

- Issue Tracker: https://github.com/samiurprapon/blog/issues
- Source Code: https://github.com/samiurprapon/blog

#

If you want to contribute to open source projects but couldn't understand all of this, It's okay. Just follow ðŸ‘‰ [First-Contribution](https://github.com/samiurprapon/blog/blob/main/.github/GUIDE.md) steps and start supporting open source community.
